author: morciuch
msg: After user customizes a portlet, an attribute is added to portlet session state which may be queried using PortletSessionState.getPortletConfigChanged method.

author: morciuch
msg: Added methods to query portlet config changed state. This is useful with custom portlets and allows to react to user customization.

msg: - tested MySQL support with Torque latest version
